Definition: In this task, you will read a given text and determine if it contains abusive content. We consider content to be abusive if it contains any negative statements directed against an identity, affiliation, or person. Counter speech that challenges, condemns, or calls out the abusive language of others is also considered abusive. Note that URLs in the text have been replaced with [Link].
